Package com.siperian.sam

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthenticationProvider
    This provides a standard interface for implementing SAM Authentication providers
    AuthenticationProviderFactory
    This provides a standard interface for implementing SAM Authentication provider factory
    AuthorizationProvider
    This provides a standard interface for implementing SAM Authorization providers
    AuthorizationProviderFactory
    This provides a standard interface for implementing SAM Authorization provider factory
    Cacheable  
    CertificateProvider  
    CertificateProviderFactory  
    Expirable  
    PasswordHashAuthenticationUtils
    Provides utilities for authentication clients and providers which support authentication by user and password hash contract.
    SamProvider
    This provides a base interface for implementing SAM providers
    SamProviderFactory
    This provides a base interface for implementing SAM provider factories
    UserProfileProvider
    This provides a standard iinterface for implementing SAM User Profile providers
    UserProfileProviderFactory
    This provides a standard interface for implementing SAM UserProfile provider factory
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthorizationDecision  
    BaseSecurityCredential  
    PasswordHashAuthenticationUtils.UserAndHash
    Represents user and hash for authentication by user and password hash contract.
    PasswordHashAuthenticationUtilsImpl  
    PkiUtilProvider  
    Role
    A security to defined in the Siperian Hub.
    SamUtils
    Provides access to Hub metadata for custom SAM providers.
    SecureResource  
    SecurityCredential
    This provides a container for the security related portion of the request data
    UserProfile
    This provides a container for the user data
    UserProfileCallback
    Implements part of the JAAS API to support custom Siperian security providers.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SamAuthenticationException
    This is thrown in case of the failed authentication
    SamProviderException
    This provides a base class for implementing SAM provider exceptions
